div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1408 Pisidia?, c. 1959 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: c. 60 AR. Selge: fr. Disposition: Athens 4 Varoucha, BCH 1960, pp. 493-4. By mistake a double-siglos from Celenderis is here in- cluded with the coins from Selge. It belongs to "tr√©sor 1," the Celenderis hd. no. 1255 above. Eski Hissar is a common Turkish place name
